ygData.subject: Re: A Maximal Victory
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobias babies crawl around the ship until they come across the bridge of the Cybertronian Fire. crawling up to one of the communication stations the baby

Phobias babies crawl around the ship until they come across the 
bridge of the Cybertronian Fire. crawling up to one of the 
communication stations the baby attatches itself to the system. The 
unit begins to beep on Maximal Frequency. (Directed at Kluster.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::The Cybertronian 
Fire/Kluster/Rex/Firearm/Smokescreen/Striker/Ramulus::
> 
> The shots hit the Cybertronian Fire's shields, the mighty ship 
easily taking 
> the energy. Missile launchers spin around to target Ares and 
Anubis, firing a 
> signature-seeking missile at each of them.
> 
> All four of the laser batteries aim upwards to fire at Sixshot as 
he flies 
> into the battle.
> 
> The autoguns aim at all the attackers, firing rapidly.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster ducks under several shots from Ares, firing back at the 
Newcomer.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Rex growls as a shot from Ares hits him. He was in pretty bad 
shape, but the 
> Maximal warrior was used to this condition.
> 
> He looks up as Sixshot flies into the battle, firing at him with 
his 
> heavy-fire rifle.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> "YEEHAA!! Anybody order fried Preds?"
> 
> The hyper yell came from Firearm as the Maximal runs out of The 
Cybertronian 
> Fire, ready for action. The giant weapon that was instead of his 
left hand 
> was set to rapid fire mode, the heavy fire rifle in his other hand 
ready also.
> 
> He looks around, a bit disapointed. It looked like the Preds 
couldn't hold 
> out long enough for him to fight fresh troops....
> 
> He takes aim, letting loose a barrage of fire at Anubis.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker growls as the Newcomers keep fighting.
> 
> "Why don't you retreat like the rest of the Preds?" he yells at 
Ares, firing 
> a missile at him, "You'll save yourself alot of trouble!"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus ducks under a shot from Ares, jumping up to fire at the 
Newcomer.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Smokescreen runs out of The Cybertronian Fire, fully repaired. He 
looks 
> around at the attackers, taking out a charge and throwing it at 
Hades.
